si.title: "දෙවන අරලායා විසින් IMC නායකත්වය දෙනු ඇත"

en.title: “The second Arakalaya will lead the IMC”
body_lines: Former SJB MP Mujibur Rahman said that if the presidential election is adjourned this year, the second Arakalaya (SJB) will lead the United People's Power (SJB).

summary_lines: "Mujibur Rahman predicts SJB's second Arakalaya will lead UPP if presidential election is postponed."
